content: this year why not give your christmas tree a personal touch with this charming crochet heart ornament pattern you can create a sweet gingerbread heart or stick to timeless red or pink for a classic look **materials** ▢bernat yarn - topaz ▢red heart yarn - white ▢4 5 mm hook ▢tapestry needle **abbreviations us terms ** chains - chain magic_ring - magic_ring single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch increase - increase
